div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 13:55 pm CDT

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 57. North northwest wind 6 to 8 mph.

A 40 percent chance of showers, mainly between 11pm and 3am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 37. North wind around 6 mph becoming light and variable. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

A 10 percent chance of showers before 7am. Partly sunny, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 65. Windy, with a west northwest wind 7 to 12 mph increasing to 20 to 25 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 37 mph.

h3.a: 2019 Lewis and Clark Conference Music - Clark

div.p: Winside High School Chorus, under the direction of Mrs. LeNell Quinn, attended the Lewis and Clark Conference Music Day - Clark Division on Monday, November 4, 2019, at Wausa High School. Those students attending were Jayden Fuhs, Kati Topp, and Jasmine Nelson.
